name: Repulsinator
description:
Hello and Thanks for trying out our Game!

For those who just wanna hop in and play:

  • Left/Right Button: to go left and right
  • Space Button: to Jump
  • V Button: Switch between Push and Pull toward magnetic coils and Enemys
  • M Button: for Menu
  • R Button: for Restarting

For those who are a bit more interested, here is a bit about the creation:

  1. Theme - The Theme of the Trijam is Push and Pull, we immediately thought of magnets and how they push and pull.
  2. Art - MrFeatherWeather made the adorable art and Music.
  3. Programming - I struggled with the push and pull, but finally managed to get it to work. This resulted in pretty hard-to-beat levels though (no time)

If you read all this again a big thank you.

Kurma
